benchmark_details.name: Pick-Double Caption dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The Pick-Double Caption dataset provides distinct captions for preferred and less preferred images to mitigate issues of conflict distribution and irrelevant prompts in image synthesis models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for optimizing preference alignment in diffusion models with distinct captions.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset may contain out-of-distribution captions, which could affect model performance.

data.source: Derived from the Pick-a-Pic v2 dataset, modified to include distinct captions for images.
data.annotation: Captions generated using state-of-the-art captioning models.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on performance evaluations against benchmark datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better image quality and alignment with human preferences.
methodology.validation: The dataset and methods were validated through comparative evaluation with existing models.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset includes various prompts, but demographic factors of images are not explicitly analyzed.
harm: Potential generation of biased content due to training data.
